Tax Deductions/ Allowances: Other than design projects, no prior approval from IRAS is required. Claim enhanced deductions/ allowances in your Income Tax Return for YAs 2013 to 2018 by the filing due date.
Cash Payout: e-File the PIC cash payout application for YAs 2013 to 2018 any time after the end of the relevant financial quarter but before the filing due date of the Income Tax Return for the relevant YA.
context: productivity-and-innovation-credit-(pic)-scheme Details on the Qualifying Conditions for Cash Payout
